saito_available_1.en: SAITO is now available for purchase:

saito_long_desc.en: Saito is a layer one blockchain that pays nodes in the P2P network instead of miners or stakers, delivering a permissionless and scalable network capable of powering decentralized versions of Twitter, Facebook and Amazon without the need for predatory monopolies in the network layer.
saito_long_desc.zh: Saito作为一个获得Web3基金会Grant计划资金资助的项目，它向点对点网络中的节点付费，而不是矿工或质押者。Saito不仅提供免费的可扩展网络基础设施，并且，无需考虑网络掠夺性垄断，即可支持去中心化版的Twitter、Facebook和亚马逊。

powerful_applications_desc.en: Saito powers games, communication tools, social media apps and other data and bandwidth-intensive applications
powerful_applications_desc.zh: Saito可为游戏、通讯工具、社媒应用和其他数据等带宽密集型应用程序提供动力

polkadot_ecosystem_desc.en: Saito applications come with full support for Polkadot and other leading Web3 blockchains
polkadot_ecosystem_desc.zh: Saito支持波卡以及其它Web3版本

proper_economics_desc.en: An elegant economic design that solves fundamental scaling problems
proper_economics_desc.zh: 通过简洁的经济原理设计出基础经济模型

open_infra_desc.en: Saito funds the rollout of infrastructure for other networks as well as its own
open_infra_desc.zh: Saito不仅为自身网络提供资金，同时也为其他建立在Saito上的网络提供资金。

peer2peer_desc.en: Libraries that support everything from QR-generation and scanning to ZKP-based gaming functions
peer2peer_desc.zh: 数据库支持一切基于ZKP的游戏功能的QR生成以扫描，

app_deployment_desc.en: Open AppStore that lets developers build and deploy apps without the need to run any infrastructure
app_deployment_desc.zh: 打开应用商店，开发者无需运行任何基础设施就可以进行网络构建和应用部署

enterprise_pki_support_desc.en: A scalable PKI network layer designed to handle enterprise-level key-exchange and encryption requirements
enterprise_pki_support_desc.zh: 可用于处理企业级密钥交换和加密需求的可扩展的PKI网络层

vibrant_community_desc.en: A growing community of users interested in and excited about the applications want to build...
vibrant_community_desc.zh: 越来越多的社区用户感兴趣，他们对想要构建的应用程序十分兴奋

scalable_onchain.zh:
可扩展的
链上/数据

legals_structure_public_sale.en: Legals and Structure for Public Sale
legals_structure_public_sale.zh: 确立公募结构及合法性
